issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Launching app about 6-8 times, a single time, only 3 digits appear in buttons and 1 button appears blank.The blank button appears with another button at its bottom.Maybe the bottom button contains the number and the blank one is overlapping it. The logs do not give any error.

fields.summary: iOS: Titanium.UI.Button Acceptance TIMOB-2020 - Numbers not appear on all buttons in toolbars

comments.body: Closing as invalid, test on a jailbroken iphone 4.1 that has a virus
